name: East Bay and San Jose, CA

content.html: My daughter’s school released a new cell phone policy that includes, “School officials can read any text messages between students, even if the texts occurred outside of school hours.” Nopity nope nope.
content.value:
My daughter’s school released a new cell phone policy that includes, “School officials can read any text messages between students, even if the texts occurred outside of school hours.”

Nopity nope nope.
